name: Dried-Anchovy Condiment
keywords: anchovy, chilies, vegetable oil, side dish, spring
recipeIngredient: 1/2 green Korean hot pepper, seeded, deveined and sliced

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium saute pan, heat the oil over medium-low heat. Add the dried anchovies and hot pepper and cook, stirring occasionally, until the anchovies are very lightly browned, about 7 minutes.
Remove the pan from the heat and gently stir in the corn syrup. Serve at room temperature with barbecued meat.
